title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.297 - Restricted funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.297 - Restricted funds

State Regulations

Funds restricted by donors or grantors for specific
purposes. Restricted funds generally fall into three categories: plant
replacement and expansion fund, specific purpose fund, and endowment fund. The
accounts within each restricted fund are self-balancing, as each fund
constitutes a separate accounting entity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.297

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
